article_title: Looking Forward to Beating Hillary Clinton
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

As the new year is quickly approaching, GOP frontrunner Donald Trump says, “Next year will be an interesting one” and that he’s looking forward to “running against Hillary Clinton” in 2016 “and beating her soundly.”

“Next year will be an interesting one. I look forward to running against Hillary Clinton, a totally flawed candidate, and beating her soundly,” the real estate mogul wrote on Christmas Eve.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Trump’s comment comes after he said Clinton got “schlonged” by President Obama in the 2008 primary.
